title: Lost in the Seven Worlds
description: Lost in the Seven Worlds is the debut work of Petronela Ungureanu, an avante-garde Romanian writer. When a young woman finds herself captive in another world, she makes the mistake of falling for one of the disgraced beings. In the name of love, she is confronted with a most disturbing demand and faces a crucial decision. Will she remain lost in the Seven Worlds, or will she accept the challenge of a love beyond mortality?
author: Petronela Ungureanu
